title: Widget that shows mail mostly comes up blank most of time
creator: turntableclocks
content:
Hi everyone, I have a pixel 7 that is on the latest release of Android 16

I'm using Thunderbird for Android to access my work server through POP3 secure and it works allowing me to receive and send emails

The widget that I use on my Android to show all my emails including any that come in new mostly shows up completely blank, randomly, after unknown circumstances. When I get a new email I will briefly be able to see the new email subject as well as other emails that are sitting in the box that have already been read. It also will show the current email and previous emails in the non-bold text for a while.

This is really frustrating as I needed to work like a normal app showing things sitting in the inbox that I've already been read at a glance.

Yes, inbox has been selected into UniFi so that way it should be shown.

Unless I misunderstand how to use Thunderbird for Android. I can't see where the problem lies.

I have uploaded a screenshot of the widget that shows unified inbox at the top and the blank area below. This box gets populated as I stated above only when new emails come.

Additional shots show when a new email comes in. It suddenly all appears

The last shot shows that it redraws after reading the new email so that all the red emails are in bold

I have clipped these screen images to protect my privacy on other emails sitting in the display

And helps. Her thoughts would be appreciated, again, I'm assuming this is a bug and I don't know how report this bug adequately
